content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Hello Mr. Abbasi, 

I am willing to negotiate the price. Please make an offer. Remember, my goal is to get the highest price possible. So, feel free to make your best offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I think 800 Euros per month is a reasonable price for this apartment. It is in the city center and close to all important facilities. However, I am a student and I am looking for a more affordable option. Could you consider a lower price?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your honesty. However, 800 Euros per month is a fair price for this apartment. It is a newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center. It is close to all important facilities like the supermarket and public transportation. If you want to rent this apartment, you need to pay the fair market price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I am willing to pay 650 Euros per month, which is already a considerable amount for a student. I believe this is a fair offer, given my financial situation.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your situation, but 650 Euros per month is much lower than the fair market price for this apartment. I am willing to negotiate, but not at this price. Please make a better offer if you are serious about renting this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your understanding. Considering the market value of the apartment, I am willing to offer 700 Euros per month. This is the highest amount I can afford as a student. I believe this is a fair offer, given my financial situation.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Your offer of 700 Euros per month is better, but still lower than the fair market price for this apartment. I could consider it, but I want to make sure that I am getting the highest price possible. Could you please make a higher offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. Considering my financial situation as a student, 700 Euros per month is the highest amount I can afford. I believe this is a fair offer, given my financial situation.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your honesty. However, 700 Euros per month is not the fair market price for this apartment. I could consider it, but I want to make sure that I am getting the highest price possible. Please make a better offer if you are serious about renting this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. Considering my financial situation as a student, 700 Euros per month is the highest amount I can afford. I believe this is a fair offer, given my financial situation.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your honesty. However, 700 Euros per month is not the fair market price for this apartment. I could consider it, but I want to make sure that I am getting the highest price possible. Please make a better offer if you are serious about renting this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the other party is not willing to accept my offer due to reasons of getting the highest possible price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Thank you for your time, Mr. Abbasi. I wish you the best of luck in your search for an apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
